frontmatter.title: Deciphering Big Data
frontmatter.excerpt: E-portfolios have gained prominence in higher education to document and showcase students' learning experiences and achievements. This paper presents an e-portfolio created for the "Deciphering Big Data" module at the University of Essex. The e-portfolio includes the required components specified by the module guidelines and allows students to delve into independently chosen topics within big data. Furthermore, the e-portfolio documents the student's learning successes throughout the module. It highlights progression, growth, and achievements in knowledge acquisition, skill development, and applying theoretical concepts to practical scenarios. Additionally, it emphasises active participation and contributions to group projects, demonstrating the ability to collaborate effectively and produce high-quality outputs.
